channel.title: Comments for page "Grim Prediction"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Grim Prediction"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: no its 50 to bingo then 100 more stamina to use the jutsu so you can track anyone for 150 stamina dont really mean you can bingo them there are plenty of ways to stop from being bingo'd

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
So basically you can Bingo anyone at the cost of 100 chakra and +50 stamina (100 total stamina consumed). I guess it's great for the bingo challenge at trade lvl.3 . I mean the one which requires you bingo-ing a top10 player.
Am I right?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: During the tracking part of the bingo an option will appear to use this jutsu.

So, how long does this last? Do you use it during a bingo attempt, or during a regular mission? Does the effect last for the day or during your next bingo attempt? It's a bit confusing and some clarification (directly on the page) would be appreciated.
